item.title: 特朗普关税议程成为头条新闻，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的最新贸易举措，包括威胁对芯片进口征收 100%的关税，给黄金带来了不确定性，但黄金仍保持温和跌势。【原文：Gold held a moderate loss, as traders looked past uncertainty created by US President Donald Trump’s latest trade moves, including threatening a 100% tariff on chip imports.】

item.title: 美联储降息押注将使印尼债券比同行更受提振
item.description: 随着对美联储降息预期的不断升温，印尼债券很可能成为亚洲最大的受益者，从而刺激整个地区出现一连串的上涨。【原文：Indonesian bonds are likely to be the biggest beneficiary in Asia as growing expectations of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts spur a cascade of gains across the region.】

item.title: 交易员撇清美国对俄举动的影响，石油保持跌势
item.description: 石油连续五天下跌，创下自一月份以来的最长跌势，原因是投资者在追踪美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推动停止乌克兰战争的外交努力的同时，也在关注美国惩罚俄罗斯原油买家的努力。【原文：Oil held a five-day decline — the longest losing run since January — as investors looked beyond US efforts to punish buyers of Russian crude, while tracking a diplomatic push by President Donald Trump to halt the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 南美头号牛肉运输商在关税前建立美国库存
item.description: 据南美最大的牛肉出口商巴西公司的财务主管称，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对巴西征收 50%的关税之前，该公司已在美国建立了库存。【原文：The top exporter of beef from South America has built up inventories in the US ahead of President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs on Brazil, according to its top fianance boss.】

item.title: 英格兰银行将降息至两年低点
item.description: 英国央行将把利率下调至两年多来的最低水平，因为英国央行的决策者们正在应对经济放缓和就业市场因税收增加而受到的冲击。【原文：The Bank of England is set to cut interest rates to the lowest level in over two years, as its policymakers contend with a slowing economy and a jobs market rattled by higher taxes.】

item.title: 瑞银称中国房地产下滑持续时间将超预期
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）曾是预测中国房地产业复苏的少数几家公司之一，但现在该集团预计，随着第二季度销售再次放缓，中国房地产业的复苏将被推迟。【原文：UBS Group AG, which had been among the few firms predicting a recovery in China’s property sector, now expects a delay following a renewed sales slowdown in the second quarter.】

item.title: 智利铜矿崩塌后，Codelco 正在寻求重启
item.description: 据知情人士透露，智利最大的铜矿上周因致命事故停工后，Codelco 提出了重启部分工程的申请。【原文：Codelco filed a request to restart parts of its biggest copper mine in Chile after a deadly accident halted work last week, according to people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 星展银行因手续费和交易收入增加而盈利超预期
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）公布的第二季度利润超出预期，主要得益于交易和财富手续费收入的大幅增长。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. reported second-quarter profit that beat expectations, buoyed by a jump in income from trading and wealth fees.】

item.title: 特朗普提出芯片关税后，美国期货攀升：市场综述
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普警告可能对芯片进口征收100%的关税后，美国期货攀升，亚洲股票期货涨跌不一。【原文：US futures climbed and Asian equity futures were mixed after President Donald Trump warned he may impose a 100% tariff on chip imports.】

item.title: 宏利收购 Comvest，建立价值 184 亿美元的私人信贷部门
item.description: 宏利金融公司（Manulife Financial Corp. ）同意收购 Comvest Credit Partners 的多数股权，从而创建一个价值 184 亿美元的私人信贷平台，以加速其在另类投资领域的扩张。【原文：Manulife Financial Corp. agreed to buy a majority stake in Comvest Credit Partners, creating an $18.4 billion private credit platform as the insurer accelerates its expansion into alternative investments.】

item.title: 航天器制造商 Firefly 通过扩大首次公开募股规模融资 8.68 亿美元
item.description: Firefly Aerospace 公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 8.68 亿美元，股票定价高于市场范围，反映了卫星发射服务需求的激增。【原文：Firefly Aerospace Inc. raised $868 million in an upsized initial public offering, pricing its shares above a marketed range in a reflection of the surging demand for satellite launch services.】

item.title: 日本政治困境促使对 30 年期债券拍卖持谨慎态度
item.description: 日本的政治和财政不确定性不断增加，可能会拖累周四举行的 30 年期国债拍卖需求，因为投资者情绪脆弱，导致收益率持续走高。【原文：Japan’s mounting political and fiscal uncertainties risk weighing on demand at an auction of 30-year government debt on Thursday as fragile investor sentiment keeps yields elevated.】

item.title: 特斯拉前高管创办汽车人工智能公司 DensityAI

item.description: 大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife Inc.【原文：MetLife Inc. shares tumbled after the insurer posted second-quarter earnings that missed estimates.】

item.description: 据一位熟悉谈判情况的人士称，加拿大航空公司在可能的罢工之前，向其空乘人员提出了在四年内总体增长 30% 以上的建议。【原文：Air Canada offered its flight attendants an overall increase of more than 30% over four years ahead of a potential strike, according to a person familiar with the negotiations.】

item.title: 什么是特朗普对印度征收的 "二次关税"？
item.description: 在其第二任美国总统任期内，唐纳德-特朗普将关税作为一种一揽子解决方案，以实现广泛的目标：增加国内制造业和外国市场准入、增加联邦收入，甚至惩罚起诉其政治盟友、前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗的巴西政府。现在，他又使用了一种他称之为 "二次关税 "的工具，试图让各国与美国的对手保持距离。【原文：In his second term as US president, Donald Trump has used tariffs as a blanket solution to pursue a wide range of goals: increasing domestic manufacturing and foreign market access, boosting federal revenue, and even punishing the government of Brazil for prosecuting his political ally, former President Jair Bolsonaro. Now he’s deployed a tool he calls a “secondary tariff” in an effort to get countries to distance themselves from US adversaries.】

item.title: Duolingo 的非语言产品有助于提升销售前景
item.description: Duolingo Inc.周三上调了今年的盈利预期，并表示已经收购了一家音乐游戏初创公司，以帮助加快扩大语言学习游戏以外的产品范围。【原文：Duolingo Inc. on Wednesday lifted its earnings forecast for the year and said it had acquired a music-gaming startup to help speed up the broadening of its offerings beyond language-learning games.】

item.title: Topgolf 的冰冻玛格丽特和半价日帮助其收入超过预期

item.title: 受关税影响，Sonos 今年将提高硬件价格
item.description: Sonos 公司周三表示，将在今年晚些时候提高部分产品的价格，此举有可能使该公司在经历了 2024 年的动荡之后卷土重来的尝试变得更加复杂。【原文：Sonos Inc. will raise prices on some products later this year, the company said Wednesday, a move that threatens to complicate its comeback attempt following a tumultuous 2024.】

item.title: 花旗首席执行官弗雷泽就房利美和房地美公开募股问题会见特朗普
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）周三会见了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普，就抵押贷款巨头房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）公开发行股票一事进行了推介。【原文：Citigroup Inc. item.title: Blackstone 向私人信贷寻求 30 亿美元 Enverus 贷款
